itemDescription: Royal Irish Constabulary Inspector-General; Governor of the Seychelles; Governor and Commander-in-Chief of Kenya; British civil servant

wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier-General Sir Joseph Aloysius Byrne  (2 October 1874 – 13 November 1942) was the Royal Irish Constabulary's Inspector-General from 1916 until 1920. He later served in Sierra Leone, Seychelles and Kenya.

response: *Brigadier-General Sir Joseph Aloysius Byrne  Governor and Commander-in-Chief of the Colony of Kenya.
*Brigadier-General Joseph Aloysius Byrne  Inspector-General, Royal Irish Constabulary
*Brigadier-General Sir Joseph Aloysius Byrne  Governor and Commander-in-Chief of Sierra Leone
*Major and Brevet Lieutenant-Colonel Joseph Aloysius Byrne, late Royal Inniskilling Fusiliers
